om.tnavigator.reports
Class XmlReportWriter

java.lang.Object
  om.tnavigator.reports.TabularReportWriter
      om.tnavigator.reports.XmlReportWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
XmlForDownloadReportWriter
public class XmlReportWriter
extends TabularReportWriter

A report writer for writing reports as XML. The document element will be , and each row will be wrapped in a tag.
